document.full_text: cash-rich technology companies are increasingly willing to go hostile in their bids for rivals, but potential targets are more worried about another threat -- shareholder activism, senior bankers said on tuesday.
document.title: tech boards more "proactive" over activism
lines_and_colors: cash-rich technology companies are increasingly willing to go hostile in their bids for rivals, but potential targets are more worried about another threat -- shareholder activism, senior bankers said on tuesday.
